message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I think it will be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget concerns, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet closer to the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $14,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'd be willing to go up to $11,500. Can we meet there?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $11,500 is close, but the product is truly worth more. Would you consider $13,000? It's a fair compromise.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Alice. I can see the value in the product, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $12,500. That's the absolute max I can go.
